title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: D. P.", 1930–45
medium: Pen and blue ink, brush and blue, red watercolor, graphite on cream illustration board
markings: On verso, a Canson and Montgolfier label.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right corner: D. P.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Monogram comprised of a "D" the curved element in outline, the vertical element formed by three blue bands superimposed upon a smaller solid red "P", the rounded element forming the center of the "D".

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: D. P.", 1930–45.
1930–45. Pen and blue ink, brush and blue, red watercolor, graphite on cream illustration board. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-96.
